item.title: Being Secure vs Feeling Secure
item.description: There is a big difference between “Being Secure” and “Feeling Secure”. Far too often even security professionals (financial, physical, computer, or any other) lean towards “feeling secure” rather than actually “being secure” because “being secure” is very very hard, if not impossible. Feeling Secure is a feeling in your gut that you’ve done all you can think of and covered every base (that you know about). You have used every little trick you know about, even if you don’t know how or why it works.
